attributes.additional_details: Legislation needs to be changed to give permission for the local council to do something
attributes.background: Give permission to Bath City Council to control gulls as they are more than a pest, endangering life and making the city unpleasant to live in.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Allow the culling of seagulls in urban and commercial areas by pest control:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637829
